title: Remove bottom lane from the game
body: Bottom lane is the most cancerous thing I have ever witnessed, has to be the most boring and dull lane of all. Rito should remove this, start a movement boys #NoMoreBot

replies.body: If you take out bottom lane, then there will be two lanes left. Out of those two lanes, one of them will be bottom because there's no middle.
I like bot lane, {{champion:412}} is ma bae
